threats.title: SQL Injection
threats.description: Attackers inject malicious SQL statements through input fields, enabling unauthorized data access or manipulation of the Azure SQL Database.

threats.title: Crossâ€‘Site Scripting (XSS)
threats.description: Malicious scripts are injected into web pages viewed by users, allowing attackers to steal session tokens or perform actions on behalf of legitimate users.

threats.title: Broken Authentication
threats.description: Weak password policies, session fixation, or inadequate token validation allow attackers to impersonate legitimate users or gain unauthorized access.
